verbs.description: With his first meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un behind him , President Donald Trump [V: is] turning his attention to the possibility of another marquee summit : with Russian President Vladimir Putin .

[ARGM-ADV: With his first meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un behind him] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: turning] [ARG1: his attention] [ARGM-DIR: to the possibility of another marquee summit : with Russian President Vladimir Putin] .
